name: In re Robert TALLY. Appeal of Robert TALLY

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: In re Robert TALLY. Appeal of Robert TALLY.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Decree of the Court of Common Pleas of Allegheny County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John Corbett, Jr., Erika Kreisman, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
James A. Esler, Asst. County Sol., Pittsburgh, for appel-lee. 4
casebody.head_matter:
427 A.2d 648
In re Robert TALLY. Appeal of Robert TALLY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted March 2, 1981.
Decided April 15, 1981.
John Corbett, Jr., Erika Kreisman, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
James A. Esler, Asst. County Sol., Pittsburgh, for appel-lee. 4
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
